titleStmt.title: Aleyn Mayor. At a Common-Councel holden at the Guild-hall London, on VVednesday the 23 day of November 1659
titleStmt.author: City of London (England). Court of Common Council.
Alleyne, Thomas, Sir, fl. 1660. aut

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by James Flesher printer to the honourable City of London,

notesStmt.note: Place and publication date from Wing CD-ROM, 1996.
An order of the Common Council appointing the 2nd of December to be kept as a Fast Day.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
